title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 302.5 - Compliance with traffic signals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 302.5 - Compliance with traffic signals

State Regulations

All persons on property over which the authority exercises
jurisdiction must, at all times, comply with any lawful order, signal or
direction by voice or hand of any member of the toll force or the police
department. When traffic is controlled by traffic lights, signs or by
mechanical or electrical signals, such lights, signs and signals shall be
obeyed unless a member of the toll force or police department directs
otherwise. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
302.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
